com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.local

Interface ManagerLocal<Entity,EntityId,EntityDTO,EntityIdDTO>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArtifactManagerLocal, CourseManagerLocal, DeliverableManagerLocal, ProjectManagerLocal, TeamManagerLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArtifactManager, CourseManager, DeliverableManager, ProjectManager, TeamManager

    public interface ManagerLocal<Entity,EntityId,EntityDTO,EntityIdDTO>
    Local interface that identifies a session bean that manages an entity.
